column2: VaSto - Varchi; Storia fiorentina Digital Edition
column3: The Storia fiorentina by Benedetto Varchi (1503-1565) is presented as a genetic and annotated digital edition. It has been encoded following the TEI (Text Encoding Initiative) standard and made accessible through the EVT2 visualization software; which facilitates reading and exploring annotated texts.
column4: Francesca Tomasi; Dario Brancato; Paola Italia; Valentina Pasqual
column5: Daniela Santoro; Milena Corbellini; Roberta Priore
column31: Roma; Accademia Nazionale dei Lincei; Biblioteca (Biblioteca Corsiniana) 39.D.5 (Rossi 395; Cors. 1532)

column3: The Codice Pelavicino Edizione Digitale project created a digital edition of the manuscript using the open-source EVT software; enabling in-depth study without physical consultation.

column1: Digital Edition of Aldo Moro's works
column2: Digital Edition of Aldo Moro's works
column3: Critical edition of Aldo Moro's published and unpublished texts; with their historical introduction. Entirely available online; free and open. The edition is structured in three sections covering Moro's writing and speeches; his juridical works; and his correspondence.
column5: National Edition of Aldo Moro’s works - Research Project
column19: Gli anni giovanili (1939-1946); Al ministero degli Esteri e all’opposizione nel partito (giugno 1968 – giugno 1973); Il ritorno al centro-sinistra e la “solidarietà nazionale” (giugno 1973 – maggio 1978)
